body:
The reason why they don't ban him is because he originally did tons of uploads and is currently "not breaking the rules".
I at first was enraged too but now I feel sad for him after finding out that he's doing this because he kept getting told by Chinese that his scans were shit (he's Taiwanese) so he stood at their level and now does this while showing he has the proper scans and will release the proper scans for bounty.
I still believe he should be removed from posting if he keeps this shit though.
@lindow: mods on e-hen tai are faggots
I can see that it is low quality, no need to tell me in every damn page

I don't understand.
Why the mods didn't ban this low quality retard?
He is pretty annoying. 

Btw Low quality.
